about.title: WHO I AM
about.description: I’m an avid programmer from Romania, passionate about code, design, startups and technology. I like science, travelling and films.

about.title: WHAT I DO
about.description: I create websites, I build servers, I craft Android/iOS applications and I play with Sketch learning to design great UIs.

about.title: WORK
about.description: I work for a brilliant startup called StarterSquad, where my distributed team and I help people transform their ideas into thriving startups that change the world.

about.title: FREE TIME
about.description: In my free time I swim, read, play games, rock my guitar and participate in contests, conferences or hackathons.

about.title: EARLY LIFE
about.description: Read more about how I started to love programming on my blog, right here.

achievements.description: WhatsApp for Desktop was #1 on Product Hunt and #3 on Hacker News
Launched WhatsApp for Desktop which has almost 60,000 visitors and downloads
Won FII Pratic Hackathon with UniNet, a social network for students
Messenger for Desktop was featured on Product Hunt
Launched Messenger for Desktop which has over 100,000 visitors/month and more than 1 million downloads so far (including updates)
Met cool people at Startup Weekend Iasi, my team and I were the crowd's favourite with PeerWorkout
Completed a Cloud Computing Concepts course on Coursera
Completed a Machine Learning course offered by Stanford University on Coursera
Went to the InfoEducatie National Contest with Butler, a voice-powered personal assistant
Went to the National Olympiad of C#
Won the CreateHS November challenge with CNRV.ro judged by @gvanrossum @pamelafox @jeresig @dhh
Learned about startups and met fascinating people at Startup Weekend Iasi
1st place @ Cisco Network Programmability contest with a QoS Manager app for Cisco routers
Went to the InfoEducatie National Contest with Hub, a social-messaging platforms aggregator app
Published a videos app in the Play Store that reached 80,000 installs
